name: ecrin-eden-website
description: Full stack project crafted with Node.js, React & MySQL. Seamlessly manage appointments & explore services. Elevate your massage experience digitally!

scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run start:server && npm run start:client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client

author: Hugo Costier
